backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no exposed methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing feature implementations, associated source files, components, tests, and confidence levels for recent profile photo features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing styles, components, hooks, and profile‑related logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and global background/foreground styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata and Google Fonts setup, loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing navigation, profile sections, theme provider, and resume intake dialog with loading and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component showing contact info, social links, and attribution based on profile data.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageShell: Simple layout wrapper providing full‑height background structure for all pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Reusable section wrapper with standardized spacing and container layout using utility class merging.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll‑spy highlighting, smooth scrolling, mobile menu, and edit button.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumeInt: Provides a dialog for users to paste or manually enter resume data, parse it, optionally upload a photo, and submit a ProfileData object.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About Me section displaying the profile summary if available.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact details such as email, location, LinkedIn, and GitHub when provided in the profile.
frontend/src/components/sections/Educati: Shows a grid of education entries including degree, institution, dates, and optional details.
frontend/src/components/sections/Experie: Renders professional experience cards with positions, companies, dates, descriptions, and highlights.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays a hero banner with name, title, summary, call-to-action buttons, and a profile photo.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Lists user projects with descriptions, technologies used, and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Shows a list of skills as badges if present in the profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login flow, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useResumeProfile.ts: Manages profile data persistence in localStorage with load, update, and reset helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollSpy.ts: Tracks the currently active section based on scroll position and returns its ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoMetadata.ts: Updates document title and meta tags based on profile data for SEO and social sharing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light/dark modes and typography.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/src/profile/parseResume.ts: Parses raw resume text into structured profile data by extracting fields like name, contact info, skills, experience, and education.
frontend/src/profile/storage.ts: Handles saving, loading, clearing, and validating profile data from localStorage.
frontend/src/profile/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for profile data, experience, education, and projects, plus an empty profile template.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, version, implemented features, and requirements metadata.
